articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Australia: Rangers shoot 14 foot crocodile that killed child - DW (English)
articles.description: The crocodile had killed a 12-year-old girl last week in the Northern Territory. Police confirmed the animal was found and then shot dead.
articles.content:
Authorities in Australia said on Wednesday that a 4.2 meter (14-foot) crocodile was located and shot dead by rangers after it killed a 12-year-old girl last week.
Northern Territory police said in a… [+1395 chars]
